Inference Pipeline¶

This document outlines the source code used to connect the fine-tuned LLMs together into a complete inference pipeline. This includes loading the trained models and all of their components, preprocessing input data, and generating predictions.

Source Code¶

  1"""
  2Script for running inference based on saved model weights. Used for both classification and summarization.
  3
  4Input -> Intent Prediction -> Classification or Summarization Model -> Output
  5"""
  6
  7from transformers import AutoTokenizer, AutoModelForSequenceClassification
  8from peft import PeftModel
  9from utils.config_loader import load_config
 10from model.model_projection import Seq2SeqWProjection, SeqClassWProjection
 11from typing import List
 12import torch.nn.functional as F
 13import json
 14import torch
 15import os
 16import logging
 17
 18config = load_config()
 19logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
 20
 21def classification_prediction(text: str) -> List[str]:
 22    """
 23    Takes clinical note input and makes predictions of possible ICD-10 code labels using
 24    fine-tuned classification LLM.
 25
 26    Args:
 27        text (str): Text to classify
 28
 29    Returns:
 30        list[str]: predicted ICD-10 codes in list format
 31    """
 32
 33    model_path = config["model"]["current_classification_model"]
 34    code_desc_path = os.path.join(model_path, "artifacts/code_desc_map.json")
 35
 36    with open(code_desc_path, "r") as file:
 37        code_descriptions = json.load(file)
 38
 39    wrapper = SeqClassWProjection.load_custom(model_path)
 40    base_model_id = getattr(wrapper.config, "base_model_name_or_path", config["model"]["classification_checkpoint"])
 41    model = wrapper
 42    model.eval()
 43    tokenizer = AutoTokenizer.from_pretrained(base_model_id)
 44
 45    inputs = tokenizer(text, return_tensors="pt", truncation=True, padding=True, max_length=512).to(model.device)
 46
 47    with torch.no_grad():
 48        outputs = wrapper(**inputs)
 49        logits = outputs["logits"] if isinstance(outputs, dict) else outputs.logits
 50    
 51    probs = torch.sigmoid(logits)
 52
 53    threshold = 0.5 # modifiable prediction threshold
 54
 55    predicted_ids = (probs > threshold).nonzero(as_tuple=True)[1].tolist()
 56
 57    predicted_labels = [model.config.id2label[i] for i in predicted_ids]
 58
 59    results = []
 60
 61    for code in predicted_labels:
 62        description = code_descriptions.get(code, "No description available.")
 63        results.append(f"{code}: {description}")
 64
 65    return "   ".join(results)
 66
 67def summarization_prediction(text: str) -> str:
 68    """
 69    Takes clinical note input and returns a summary using the fine-tune summarization LLM.
 70
 71    Args:
 72        text (str): Clinical note text to summarize
 73
 74    Returns:
 75        str: Summary of clinical note
 76    """
 77
 78    base_model = config["model"]["summarization_checkpoint"]
 79    model_path = config["model"]["current_summarization_model"]
 80
 81    tokenizer = AutoTokenizer.from_pretrained(base_model)
 82
 83    model = Seq2SeqWProjection.from_pretrained(base_model)
 84
 85    model = PeftModel.from_pretrained(model, os.path.join(model_path, "peft_model"))
 86
 87    proj_state = torch.load(os.path.join(model_path, "proj.pt"), map_location="cpu")
 88    model.proj.load_state_dict(proj_state)
 89
 90    model.to("cuda" if torch.cuda.is_available() else "cpu")
 91
 92    model.eval()
 93
 94    inputs = tokenizer(text, return_tensors="pt", max_length=512, truncation=True).to(model.device)
 95    
 96    with torch.no_grad():
 97        output_ids = model.generate(**inputs, max_new_tokens=200, do_sample=False, pad_token_id=tokenizer.pad_token_id)
 98
 99    return tokenizer.decode(output_ids[0], skip_special_tokens=True)
100
101def intent_prediction(text: str) -> str:
102    """
103    Takes clinical note w/ intent for either classification or summarization and predicts intent.
104
105    Args:
106        text (str): Clinical note to infer intent.
107
108    Returns:
109        str: Intent label (classification or summarization currently)
110    """
111
112    model_path = config["model"]["current_intent_model"]
113    id2label_path = os.path.join(model_path, "artifacts/intent_id2label.json")
114
115    tokenizer = AutoTokenizer.from_pretrained(model_path)
116    model = AutoModelForSequenceClassification.from_pretrained(model_path)
117
118    with open(id2label_path, "r") as file:
119        id2label = {int(k): v for k, v in json.load(file).items()}
120    
121    inputs = tokenizer(text, return_tensors="pt", truncation=True, max_length=512).to(model.device)
122
123    with torch.no_grad():
124        logits = model(**inputs).logits
125        probs = F.softmax(logits, dim=-1)
126        prediction = torch.argmax(probs, dim=-1).item()
127        confidence = probs[0, prediction].item()
128    
129    logger.info(f"Intent prediction {id2label[prediction]}. Confidence: {confidence:.4f}")
130    
131    return id2label[prediction]
132
133
134def model_routing_pipeline(texts: List[str]) -> None:
135    """
136    Takes text or list of texts through pipeline.
137    Intent prediction -> either classification or summarization -> output
138
139    ### Need to work on handling both single string and list of strings input.
140
141    Args:
142        texts list[str]: text(s) to feed into pipeline and return either associated ICD-10 codes (classification) or a summary of the clinical note (summarization).
143    
144    Returns:
145        None
146    """
147
148    if isinstance(texts, str):
149        inputs = [texts]
150    elif isinstance(texts, list) and all(isinstance(item, str) for item in texts):
151        inputs = texts
152    else:
153        logger.error("Input must be a string or list of strings")
154        raise ValueError("Input must be a string or list of strings")
155    
156    for input in inputs:
157
158        intent = intent_prediction(input)
159
160        if intent == "classification":
161            logger.info("Intent to classify ICD codes found.")
162            predicted_codes = classification_prediction(input)
163            print(f"Predicted ICD-10 codes for clinical note: {predicted_codes}")
164            return predicted_codes
165        
166        elif intent == "summarization":
167            logger.info("Intent to summarize clinical note found.")
168            generated_summary = summarization_prediction(input)
169            print(f"Following summary generated: {generated_summary}")
170            return generated_summary
171
172        else: # Should not happen
173            logger.error(f"Intent target must be either classification or summarization. Got {intent}.")
174            raise ValueError("Invalid intent target found.")
175
176
177
